info.author: Jason Petrone
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Determines the mime type of a file using magic numbers.  Can also 
operate on arbitrary data streams.

Much like the Unix file(1) program.
info.name: magic
info.summary: Determines a file's mime type by its magic number
info.html_description:
Determines the mime type of a file using magic numbers. Can also operate on arbitrary data streams.

Much like the Unix file(1) program.
